subSections.title: Readings
Pronoun
Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{m|ja|何}} is usually read as {{l|ja|なに}}, but before {{l|ja|だ}}, {{l|ja|で}}, {{l|ja|の}}, it is read as {{l|ja|なん}}. When followed by {{l|ja|で}}, both readings are possible, albeit with different meanings.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Related terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|何れ|どれ}} which one?
* {{ja-r|何の|どの}} (of) what?
* {{ja-r|何処|どこ}} where?
* {{ja-r|何方|どちら}} which way?
* {{ja-r|如何|どう}} in what manner?
